survey.introduction: GOOD EVENING. THIS IS (Insert Own Name) OF TRENDEX MARKET RESEARCH COMPANY CALLING. MAY I PLEASE SPEAK TO ANYONE IN YOUR HOUSEHOLD WHO IS 18 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER?

questions.question: HAVE YOU YOURSELF SMOKED ANY CIGARETTES DURING THE PAST WEEK?
ABOUT HOW MANY CIGARETTES DO YOU YOURSELF SMOKE DURING AN AVERAGE DAY?

options.30-39: Over 1 pack to less than 2 packs

questions.question: WHAT BRAND OF CIGARETTES DO YOU NOW SMOKE MOST OFTEN - THAT IS THE BRAND YOU CONSIDER TO BE YOUR REGULAR BRAND?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer in grid on opposite page - Pg.2.

questions.question: IS (insert brand) A CIGARETTE WITH A FILTER OR WITHOUT A FILTER?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer opposite brand being asked about.

questions.question: IS (insert brand) A CIGARETTE WITH MENTHOL OR WITHOUT MENTHOL?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer opposite brand being asked about.

questions.question: WHICH DO YOU USUALLY BUY MOST OFTEN - THE SOFT PACK OR THE BOX?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer opposite brand being asked about.

questions.question: IS (insert brand) THE LONGER DELUXE - THAT IS SOMETIMES CALLED 100 MILLIMETER SIZE, OR A SMALLER SIZE?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer under Col.2E opposite brand being asked about.

questions.question: IS (insert brand) THE LONGER DELUXE - THAT IS SOMETIMES CALLED 100 MILLIMETER SIZE, THE KING SIZE, OR THE SMALLER SIZE?
questions.note: Circle number corresponding to respondent's answer opposite brand being asked about.

note_to_interviewer: Answers to the following questions Q.2A through Q.2F are to be recorded.
